snippet.title: God For A Day Trailer #4 #papersplease #deathandtaxes #indiegame #lilguardsman
snippet.description:
Wishlist/buy: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2695710
In this 2D, narrative-based simulation game, you play as the Son of God. Your mission: Decide, bless or condemn city residents. Uncover the person's story through their items and secrets before making decisions. Your choices alter the city's destiny, and impact your revelation on Judgment Day. Inspired by games: #papersplease #deathandtaxes #lilguardsman
